name: OSEA Undaria Body Bestsellers Full Size Set – Includes Undaria Algae Body Oil 5oz & Undaria Algae Body Lotion 5oz – Hydrating & Firming Body Care – Perfect Holiday Gift Set
about_this_item: Age-Defying Skincare Duo: This best-selling pair of Undaria seaweed-packed body care essentials transforms dry, distressed skin into soft, hydrated, and glowing skin with every use.
Undaria Algae Body Oil (5oz): Clinically proven to improve skin elasticity while delivering deep moisturization, leaving skin firm, smooth, and radiant.

Undaria Algae Body Lotion (5oz): Scientifically proven to visibly firm skin in just 4 hours, this ultra-hydrating, lightweight lotion is packed with undaria algae and hyaluronic acid for long-lasting hydration.
Pro Tip for Layering: For optimal hydration and glow, apply the Undaria Algae Body Oil first, then layer the Undaria Algae Body Lotion on top for a radiant, moisturized finish.
Perfect Holiday Gift: Ideal for gifting, this luxurious full-size duo is a thoughtful holiday treat, offering a spa-like experience and age-defying results in one set.
